title: When will Waymo self driving cars become mainstream in the U.S.? - Quora

response.answer_text: never :) It is a dream. Airplane autopilot was invented over 100 yrs ago yet two (not just one) pilots are in an airliner. There are not as many airlines in the air at any given point of time as cars. To kill yourself in a car, you do not need a self-driving car :) A regular car suffices :)

Just like Fusion Power: 20 years from now. For any self driving car to catch on there will need to be an infrastructure created that does not exist. The car to car to traffic reports to police/EMS to non automated vehicles etc ….
